sentences.en: A 17-year-old youth was remanded in custody yesterday.
sentences.cn: 一名17岁的年轻人昨天被还押候审。

sentences.en: a dispute over who should have custody of the children
sentences.cn: 关于孩子监护权归属问题的争执

sentences.en: Allen is fighting a bitter custody battle over his three children.
sentences.cn: 艾伦为获得自己三个孩子的监护权拼死力争。

sentences.en: Barrett was taken into protective custody.
sentences.cn: 巴雷特被保护性地监禁起来。

sentences.en: Carter was remanded in custody for seven days.
sentences.cn: 卡特在押候审7天。

sentences.en: Child custody is normally granted to the mother.
sentences.cn: 孩子的监护权通常判给母亲。

sentences.en: He is in custody awaiting trial .
sentences.cn: 他已被拘留候审。

sentences.en: He was sentenced to two years' youth custody.
sentences.cn: 他被判处在少年犯拘留所拘禁两年。

sentences.en: He was taken into custody immediately after the robbery.
sentences.cn: 抢劫案发生后,他立即被押了起来.

sentences.en: His car was held in the custody of the police.
sentences.cn: 他的汽车被警察扣压.

sentences.en: I'm going to go to court to get custody of the children.
sentences.cn: 我将起诉，要求获得孩子们的监护权。

sentences.en: Managers are responsible for the safe custody and retention of records.
sentences.cn: 经理有责任安全保管并保留记录。

sentences.en: She was taken into custody later that day.
sentences.cn: 她那天后来被拘留了。

sentences.en: She's petitioning to regain custody of the child.
sentences.cn: 她请求重获孩子的监护权。

sentences.en: The collection of art books is now in the custody of the university.
sentences.cn: 这批艺术类藏书现在由这所大学保管。

sentences.en: The couple will retain joint custody (= they will both have custody ) of their daughters.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩将继续保留对女儿的共同监护权。

sentences.en: The criminal was taken into custody.
sentences.cn: 这个罪犯已被监禁.

sentences.en: The hit - and - run driver has been in custody.
sentences.cn: 那个驾车 肇事 后逃跑的司机已被看押起来了.

sentences.en: The mother got custody of the children.
sentences.cn: 母亲获得了孩子的监护权.

sentences.en: The mother is usually awarded custody (= legally allowed to have custody ) .
sentences.cn: 母亲通常会获得监护权。

sentences.en: Who will have custody of the children?
sentences.cn: 谁来负责监护这些孩子？

trans.tran_en: when someone is responsible for keeping and looking after something
